verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> we [wish to] <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to you the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which has been <S%G1325>given<s%> in the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%>

that in a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1382>ordeal<s%> of <S%G2347>affliction<s%> their <S%G4050>abundance<s%> of <S%G5479>joy<s%> and their <S%G899>deep<s%> <S%G4432>poverty<s%> <S%G4052>overflowed<s%> in the <S%G4149>wealth<s%> of their <S%G572>liberality.<s%>
For I <S%G3140>testify<s%> that <S%G2596>according<s%> to their <S%G1411>ability,<s%> and <S%G3844>beyond<s%> their <S%G1411>ability<s%> [they gave] of their <S%G830>own<s%> <S%G830>accord,<s%>
<S%G1189>begging<s%> us with <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3874>entreaty<s%> for the <S%G5485>favor<s%> of <S%G2842>participation<s%> in the <S%G1248>support<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%>
and [this,] not as we had <S%G1679>expected,<s%> but they <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and to us by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1519>Consequently<s%> <S%G3588><s%> we <S%G3870>urged<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> that as he had <S%G4278>previously<s%> <S%G4278>made<s%> a <S%G4278>beginning,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> he would <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2005>complete<s%> in you <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5485>gracious<s%> <S%G5485>work<s%> as <S%G2532>well.<s%>

But <S%G5618>just<s%> as you <S%G4052>abound<s%> in <S%G3956>everything,<s%> in <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G3056>utterance<s%> and <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4710>earnestness<s%> and in the <S%G26>love<s%> we <S%G1537>inspired<s%> in you, [see] that you <S%G4052>abound<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5485>gracious<s%> <S%G5485>work<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

I am not <S%G3004>speaking<s%> [this] as a <S%G2003>command,<s%> but as <S%G1381>proving<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4710>earnestness<s%> of <S%G2087>others<s%> the <S%G1103>sincerity<s%> of your <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

For you <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that though He was <S%G4145>rich,<s%> yet for your <S%G1223>sake<s%> He <S%G4433>became<s%> <S%G4434>poor,<s%> that you through His <S%G4432>poverty<s%> might <S%G4147>become<s%> <S%G4147>rich.<s%>

And I <S%G1325>give<s%> [my] <S%G1106>opinion<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> matter, for <S%G3778>this<s%> is to your <S%G4851>advantage,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> were the <S%G4278>first<s%> to <S%G4278>begin<s%> a <S%G4070>year<s%> <S%G4070>ago<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> [this,] but <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G2309>desire<s%> [to do it.]

But <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G2005>finish<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> it <S%G2532>also;<s%> that <S%G2509>just<s%> as [there was] the <S%G4288>readiness<s%> to <S%G2309>desire<s%> it, <S%G3779>so<s%> [there may be] <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G2005>completion<s%> of it by your <S%G2192>ability.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G4288>readiness<s%> is <S%G4295>present,<s%> it is <S%G2144>acceptable<s%> <S%G2526>according<s%> to what [a man] <S%G2192>has,<s%> not <S%G2526>according<s%> to what he does not <S%G2192>have.<s%>
For [this] is not for the <S%G425>ease<s%> of <S%G243>others<s%> [and] for your <S%G2347>affliction,<s%> but by <S%G1537>way<s%> of <S%G2471>equality<s%> â€“

at <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> your <S%G4051>abundance<s%> [being a supply] for their <S%G5303>want,<s%> that their <S%G4051>abundance<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> [a supply] for your <S%G5303>want,<s%> that there may be <S%G2471>equality;<s%>

as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "He who [gathered] <S%G4183>much<s%> did not <S%G4121>have<s%> <S%G4121>too<s%> <S%G4121>much,<s%> and he who [gathered] <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G1641>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1641>lack.<s%>"
But <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be to <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G1325>puts<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4710>earnestness<s%> on your <S%G5228>behalf<s%> in the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G5103>Titus.<s%>

For he not <S%G3303>only<s%> <S%G1209>accepted<s%> our <S%G3874>appeal,<s%> but <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G830>himself<s%> very <S%G4705>earnest,<s%> he has <S%G1831>gone<s%> to you of his <S%G830>own<s%> <S%G830>accord.<s%>

And we have <S%G4842>sent<s%> <S%G4842>along<s%> with him the <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G1868>fame<s%> in [the things of] the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> [has spread] <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches;<s%>

and not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G3778>[this,<s%>] but he has <S%G2532>also<s%> been <S%G5500>appointed<s%> by the <S%G1577>churches<s%> to <S%G4898>travel<s%> with us in this <S%G5485>gracious<s%> <S%G5485>work,<s%> which is being <S%G1247>administered<s%> by us for the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G846>Himself,<s%> and [to show] our <S%G4288>readiness,<s%>

<S%G4724>taking<s%> <S%G4724>precaution<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> should <S%G3469>discredit<s%> us in our <S%G1247>administration<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G100>generous<s%> <S%G100>gift;<s%>

for we <S%G4306>have<s%> <S%G4306>regard<s%> for what is <S%G2570>honorable,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>

And we have <S%G4842>sent<s%> with them our <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G1381>tested<s%> and <S%G1510>found<s%> <S%G4705>diligent<s%> in <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things,<s%> but <S%G3570>now<s%> <S%G4183>even<s%> <S%G4183>more<s%> <S%G4705>diligent,<s%> because of [his] <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4006>confidence<s%> in you.

As for <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> [he is] my <S%G2844>partner<s%> and <S%G4904>fellow<s%> <S%G4904>worker<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> you; as for our <S%G80>brethren,<s%> [they are] <S%G652>messengers<s%> of the <S%G1577>churches,<s%> a <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G4383>openly<s%> <S%G1519>before<s%> <S%G4383><s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> <S%G1731>show<s%> them the <S%G1732>proof<s%> of your <S%G26>love<s%> and of our <S%G2746>reason<s%> for <S%G2746>boasting<s%> <S%G5228>about<s%> you.
